text: Nandao ni meiyou kanjian nage ren ma? An la ba guo quan shangci ta, gu ta yu yi bo la xin zhenglun ta de zhu. Dangshi, yi bo la xin shuo:“Wo de zhu neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si.” Ta shuo:“Wo ye neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si.” Yi bo la xin shuo:“An la dique neng shi taiyang cong dongfang sheng qi, ni neng shi ta cong xifang sheng qi ma?” Nage bu xindao de ren, jiu ya kou wu yanle.
